website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy full-featured gazebo kit, but prepare to spend some time self-sealing the roof with silicone to make this option waterproof.
pros: Roof is constructed of galvanized steel panels over a rustproof aluminum frame
Comes with a thick, PVC-coated mosquito netting
Built-in rain gutter on the outside and light hooks on the inside
Assembles in about a day with two people
cons: Roof panels have seams around them that leak
Some screw holes don't line up, which can add to assembly difficulty
Metal roof can get pretty hot in the sun

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice item! Arrived in two boxes on pallets
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice item! Arrived in two boxes on pallets. Lots of pieces, but instructions are straight forward. You will need at least two people for the assembly. The key to it putting it together is to not completely tighten the nuts and bolts until they are all installed. Once you have it together, square it up and tighten the frame first then the roof panels. We anchored two of the legs on one side once the frame was built, then finished putting it together followed by squaring it up, tightening and anchoring the other two legs. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MMurf

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, sturdy product. My initial shipment was short some pieces but after calling the number provided in the packaging the company shipped the parts in a timely manner. This is a vary solid structure which should hold up to wind and snow loading. I did anchor the legs which I would strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for 2 seasons and it virtually indistinguishable from new. Left up all year, clean it in the spring and wipe it down with automotive spray wax, coat the screw heads in the rain channels with silicone. If it had a better designed gutter system it would be perfect but very pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: John Wiley

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret buying this gazebo.
customer_reviews.text: High quality gazebo for a decent price! The black netting is way nicer than I originally hoped for, I was originally just going to remove it. I secures in a lovely way to the poles, creating a tapered look. I had edison string lights installed in the interior and it is a great space to entertain. Assemble time was the only downfall; lots of little pieces. With two people it still took a day, but it is sturdy and looks like it cost more than what I paid. All in all I would recommend this gazebo 100%
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Gray

customer_reviews.title: High quality product. Took me and my father 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. Took me and my father 7 hours to assemble the frame only. Although fame took a while to assemble, it was not even half as difficult as assembling the roof panels. That would be near impossible to assemble with only one person. The screw holes did not line up well, especially on the roof. It took a certain amount of shimmying and elbow grease to get it to line up enough to put the screws through. Tip for buyers: organize all parts prior to assembling. There are many parts and the instructions are not very descriptive. It's basically only pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Overall great cover. Looks good in my backyard
customer_reviews.text: Took longer than 6 hours to put up. Helps if you have lots of hand helping. Overall great cover. Looks good in my backyard. Much cheaper then hiring someone to build a wooden cover that would have cost me $4400!. What a savings when I do it myself..
customer_reviews.author: M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Sun Shelter!
customer_reviews.text: Product was received in two boxes, both in excellent shape...no damaged parts. Assembled it by myself, except for a few of the roof panels which do take two people. The video on YouTube was an excellent guide for assembly and was much better than the instruction booklet. Every part was well manufactured and marked properly. The only parts that did not alien easily were a few of the roof panels that you need 4 hands to attach. Overall I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: PENNY GIRL

customer_reviews.title: Buffalo NY snow ready!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Buffalo NY winter over hot tub to help keep snow off spa cover which breaks easily with weight (styrofoam). Like that the roof is steel. 250 nuts and bolts so does take about 6hrs to complete. All holes lined up for me so no extra drilling required for me. For the price it should include privacy curtains besides the netting. Looks sturdy and will see how it holds up in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Lori piniewski

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait for good weather to enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: Put it up myself with a little help from my wife, we are both in our seventies by the way, it took most of daylight hours for a few days . The direction could be clearer but the pieces were marked well and nothing was missing. Before you start find the gazebo on utube and watch it a couple times, I guaranty it will help a lot. Can't wait for good weather to enjoy it. Just as a side note. This is an extremely well engineered product.
customer_reviews.author: roland grrasie

customer_reviews.title: Superb material, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You pay for the quality here. I just wanted to comment on how insanely sturdy this is. I had not taken time to bolt it down to the deck as I wasn’t sure where to place it yet and a very bad storm had came out of nowhere and picked it up (with me hanging on to it as well) off the ground and into the pool. In the end, this thing was tossed upside down and came out without a dent, a bend, or a scratch anywhere. Had I gone with a cheaper material gazebo, it would not have survived the tumble.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Heath Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Love the material that it is made of
customer_reviews.text: Love the material that it is made of. However, what I hate about it is it does not give ideas to secure it. You have to go on line. It also took approx 3 days to build it. I also damaged a leg and I am having a hard time finding a replacement part to order it from. The item is made in Canda and the website and email is not going through to speak with the manufacture to find out where and how much it would cost to order a new leg for it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly W.

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice gazebo everything that I anticipated it would be
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice gazebo everything that I anticipated it would be. Problem was with the packaging for the roof several of the panels were damaged it looked as though they had been packed damaged I straighten them as best I could and use them anyway. Can say how it will do on wind resistance as I just assembled the Gazebo yesterday 4/15/17. It is rather pricey we'll see if it was really worth the amount of money I paid for it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Dave E.

customer_reviews.title: Backyard oasis
customer_reviews.text: We love this gazebo. We purchased it this spring to get more use from our backyard. The screens are excellent for keeping bugs away. Looks great and has become our party room
customer_reviews.author: MHash

customer_reviews.title: I love this canopy
customer_reviews.text: I love this canopy. It was easy to put up with two people. Very sturdy and I was pleased that even though it is metal the posts are cool to the touch. The mosquito netting is the heaviest I have ever had. We have had high winds are it stood up to them. We have it bolted fast to our deck. The only thing is I wish it would have come with curtains to block the sun early morning. I would recommend this product to everyone. No more buying a canopy every two years No more having to take it down every fall. Thank you for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Ebersole

customer_reviews.title: Gazebo
customer_reviews.text: i like it because it was charcoal colored and it is very sturdy. It was pretty easy to put together but there were a lot of parts. No parts missing which was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Reinke

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase! It was easy to put together but took longer than expected. LOTS of screws! I do recommend getting a better allen wrench as the two it came with are of low quality and strip easy. It was packaged very well and I had no damage to any of the pieces. Everything lined up well. If you are thinking of buying this one, it is worth the money. There is a youtube video on this for putting it together. It was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: tina madere

customer_reviews.title: Great Gazebo
customer_reviews.text: Great gazebo. Well crafted. Gutter system directs rain down the corner posts, so it doesn't rain down all sides. Keeps my outdoor couch and cushions dry without having to cover them. Bolt holes to secure it to the deck. Needed some extra parts, outstanding customer service with Big Deal Savings.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper44

customer_reviews.title: I followed the instructions line by line and it all came together fine. Be careful not to over torque the screws
customer_reviews.text: It's a lengthy process so plan accordingly. I followed the instructions line by line and it all came together fine. Be careful not to over torque the screws. If you use a drill, use one that can limit the torque. DWD 7/15/2015
customer_reviews.author: DWD

customer_reviews.title: Just as listed.
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture. This is a great structure. Not a 6 hour job though, unless there are three men that do construction. But a sixty something couple can do it in 15 hours. Comes packaged well, parts are labeled great and the instructions are good. We have it bolted to our wooded deck. Would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Smith

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: So far it's perfect for what we were looking for. Looks just like pictured. Good quality. Really really hard and time consuming to put together, definitely not a one day set up.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cholnik

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: We have set this cover up in our yard. Perfect size and height. Easy to assemble.

customer_reviews.title: Head turner.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Neighbor's all want to buy one. Definitely better than similar other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Tomahawk66

customer_reviews.title: Great gazebo. A pain to install by myself - ...
customer_reviews.text: Great gazebo. A pain to install by myself - definitely helps to have two people, but I was able to accomplish it. Leak free and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: WildVince22

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I put it together and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was sooner than expected. My husband and I put it together and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ileana & Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Requires two people to install roof
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Requires two people to install roof, and three would be better, but seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Lizz Rogers

customer_reviews.title: I Love it but there is a lot of parts to ...
customer_reviews.text: I Love it but there is a lot of parts to put together and the directions are just pictures it would be nice to have actual instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... have had for over a year now and very pleased with the quality of this product
customer_reviews.text: I have had for over a year now and very pleased with the quality of this product . Looks as good as it did the day I put it up .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... they say and all but a few issues I'm happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: It is what they say and all but a few issues I'm happy with the product. I had to re-drill about 6 holes because of miss alignment with connecting holes for screws. Not sure about leaks yet, no rain in SoCal. I put it up myself and only needed help with about 7 screws I couldn't reach. No big deal, just take your time and used a power drill set on a low torque setting, saved a lot of time. Be careful not to over torque. Of all the ones on the market this is the only one that seemed worth the money, it's sturdy, solid and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! I love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I love it. I recommend having some help with installation. I did this by myself and it took some creativity setting it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth to Money
customer_reviews.text: Very good item worth the money, we paid someone to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: james moscato

customer_reviews.title: Construction was realitively easy,, but the predicted time to complete the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the kit. Construction was realitively easy,,but the predicted time to complete the construction was a lot more than 6 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Katina Williams

customer_reviews.title: ... the gazebo up for a week but we already love it. We had a pretty good rain and ...
customer_reviews.text: We have only had the gazebo up for a week but we already love it. We had a pretty good rain and not a drop leaked. Had to watch the YouTube video twice , and took about 16 hours to assemble. Our gazebo it screwed to our deck floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far Taking my time putting it together ...
customer_reviews.text: Like it so far Taking my time putting it together It looks good on our deck
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice, well constructed gazebo
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, well constructed gazebo. My husband and a friend put it together in about 13 work hrs. (2 days) The mosquito netting is nice quality, unlike some of the flimsier ones I have seen. I intend to get the privacy curtain at a later date. The only problem was my husband built a platform for a 10' X 12' gazebo, the actual size from pole to pole is 9' 1" X 11' 2". That was disappointing. I would recommend this product, it is very nice, and feels sturdy not to mention very attractive!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Licato

customer_reviews.title: We put it up in September and did have so pretty strong winds after it was up
customer_reviews.text: Although the erection was very time consuming we did feel that the instructions were specific enough to follow. We put it up in September and did have so pretty strong winds after it was up. Performed very well. It is very sturdy and we are hopeful that is will do well this winter in CO. I would recommend this product unconditionally. The price discount was one of the final deciding factors. $1,000.00 off list price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's nice. Just overpriced really
customer_reviews.text: It's nice. Just overpriced really. I did not realize there was a brown one for $1200 until AFTER I purchased this one :(
customer_reviews.author: Lanam9955

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Love the gazebo! Was very difficult to put together though!
customer_reviews.author: Nanna W.

customer_reviews.title: The top roof on the messina gazebo leaks. Took ...
customer_reviews.text: The top roof on the messina gazebo leaks . Took forever to get in touch with manufacturer about missing parts. Then it took forever to get parts. Expensive and not worth the money. No complaints about seller just manufacturer (Sojag)
customer_reviews.author: Carol Neubig

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: incredible structure for the money. instructions a little vague but it isn't rocket science
customer_reviews.author: joe carpio jr

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking structure
customer_reviews.text: It looks good assembled and went together as expected. I am not sure about the longevity of some of the parts however, while the unit is aluminum and the roof panels are galvanized, after being assembled three weeks, some of the acorn nuts on the underside of the structure have already started to rust. As an added note all of the fasteners are metric.
customer_reviews.author: Keithp

customer_reviews.title: a trip to the hardware store for fasteners and some silicone to stop the drips and its good to go
customer_reviews.text: It was a challenge to assemble, but finally got it. Some screws were not included, some holes didn't match up, but with a drill, a trip to the hardware store for fasteners and some silicone to stop the drips and its good to go. Did it myself, without assistance.
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Fits perfectly on my new patio and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fits perfectly on my new patio and is a really nice compliment. Perfect size for a round table and 4 large chairs, works great with the mosquito netting in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: John O

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this years ago
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Good price. Took about six hours to assemble.... 95% solo. Only needing help with upper roof bolts and initial frame raising. Get yourself a drill with clutch cuz you have 300 plus screws to tighten.
customer_reviews.author: TLee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just received my new hard top today. Haven't opened the boxes yet. Can't wait to see how amazing it looks on my new deck. :)
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN CHINA
customer_reviews.text: Made in CHINA its junk, when it says tighten they really do not mean it . First time I have EVER finger tightened a bolt and stripped the threads.. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Robert

product_meta.title: Sojag 500-7156980 Track No.77 Messina Hard Top Sun Shelter, 10' by 12', Charcoal
product_meta.description: Improve your outdoor living space with the 4 season Messina Sun Shelter. It provides a shaded space to relax by the pool during hot summer days as well as a haven for friends and family to gather for a dining experience. It is at the forefront of the new wave outdoor living experience with its durable galvanized steel roof and high quality powder-coated aluminum frame. It includes one set of mosquito netting made of nylon, which is extremely durable and reduces wind and sun exposure. The Messina will provide years of protection from the elements.
feature_bullets: No need to store the roof away for the winter (snow should always be removed from the shelter)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars110 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
